column5: Got out to the local river by about 8:00AM today.... water was in good condition...still -5 , so we battled the cold wind and slushy waters until about 11:00 , when things started to warm up. Managed a few fish within the crowds of guys out there....Crowds are to be expected now so I am not going to wine about it...Like others said posts like this don't help in reducing them but whatever, I have learned to face the music by know on weekends !!!  Any how I went 4 for 6 and my buddy did about the same, All fish on white and peach roe bags. Ran out of pinkies but from what i had seen others were doing well with them all day.. Here's some highlights. It was too cold to pull out the camera everytime we got a fish on so I only snapped a few....I am not going to bother smudging out the backround on the couple of pics.  3/4's of Toronto steelheaders were out there today, so like Kemper said.... it aint news that the fish are in at this stream. Enjoy.....  Oh ya , good running into you down there, DMASSE and your buddy(not sure if you are on the board)..See you guys out there again sometime    nice action shot of my buddy I thought turned out good    LOL @ my buddy as he looses this nice female at the bank trying to take a pic...I have it all on video to agonize him with all summer !!
Some nice fish! Still trying to get my first with no luck!
NICELY DONE BRO!!! WATER LOOKED MINT
Some nice fish and a great report.  Thanks for posting.
Thats a great day on the tribs bud !!!!!  nice catch,great pics too !!....thanks for sharing   cheers

good on ya.  great day .  nice report ! a cool head in the crowd prevails. welldone!!  couldn't get out this weekend ,, so green am i seeing your pic's.  hoping  this saturday will be merciful  .  appreciate the honesty dan,, i'm in the same boat.
Great report!  Great to see your success out there.  Them fishies are slippery sometimes aren't they?? LOL.
HEY! I know that spot!  (no really, I do)  haha  Great job guys! thanks for the report
Its all about grabbing the tail, but he hasn't learned that yet !!

Ya was surprised. I was expecting mud, but I guess the cold temps shut down the run off....first thing was about 12" visability then it got a bit too clear for my likings by the afternoon, and the spook kicked in....That's when we decided to go waste some money at Gagnon's !!!
AS LONG AS ITS ON GEAR ITS MONEY WELL SPENT  LOL
nice job. i took my dog out for a bike ride and i think i saw you (along with the 50 other people).
Great pics of some beauty fish.  Looks like a great day, congrats
